longBusinessSummary: Erin Ventures Inc. engages in the acquisition, exploration, and development of mineral properties. It holds interests in the Piskanja project covering an area of approximately 3 square kilometers of area located to the south of Belgrade, Serbia; and Yukon Property located in Canada. Erin Ventures Inc. has strategic partnership with Temas Resources. The company was incorporated in 1993 and is based in Victoria, Canada.
